article_metadata.author: Kurt Badenhausen

og.description: The Brazilian wunderkind has delivered so far as the face of the World Cup with four goals. Leading Brazil to a World Cup title would send Neymar's $33.6 million income soaring even higher.
og.title: 2014 World Cup: Neymar By The Numbers
